name: Verdash

aura.name: grassland_speedster
aura.description: When fighting together, increases player's movement speed and applies Grass damage to the player's attacks.

description: Land that Verdash has run across becomes extremely fertile, with thick vegetation growing there soon after. It will not run anywhere that herbicide has been used.

skills.name: wind_cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: stone_cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: seed_machine_gun
skills.description: Fires a volley of hard seeds at enemies in front of it.

skills.name: stone_blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: grass_tornado
skills.description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: spine_vine
skills.description: Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy along the ground, piercing them from below.

skills.name: solar_blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
